フィールドの詳細

CELL_WRAPPER

public static final java.lang.Object CELL_WRAPPER
layout,attachParent,layoutLeaf,join,merge,offset and bridge methods below were taken line by line from Moen's algorithm. Attempts to understand the above methods without reading the paper first are strongly discouraged. http://www.computer.org/software/so1990/s4021abs.htm modified by @author takeshi morita

LEFT_TO_RIGHT

public static final int LEFT_TO_RIGHT
